marketplace:installed:snippet:Rotating-C: {"code":"@keyframes rotating { from { transform: rotate(0deg); } to { transform: rotate(360deg); }} .cover-art { animation: rotating 10s linear infinite; clip-path: circle(50% at 50% 50%);}","title":"Rotating Cover Art","description":"Adds circular mask to cover art and rotation","imageURL":"https://raw.githubusercontent.com/spicetify/spicetify-marketplace/main/resources/assets/snippets/rotating-coverart.png"}
marketplace:installed:snippet:Oneko: {"code":".player-controls .playback-progressbar::before { content: ''; width: 32px; height: 32px; bottom: calc(100% - 7px); right: 10px; position: absolute; image-rendering: pixelated; background-image: url('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/adryd325/oneko.js/14bab15a755d0e35cd4ae19c931d96d306f99f42/oneko.gif'); animation: oneko 1s infinite; } @keyframes oneko { 0%, 50% { background-position: -64px 0; } 50.0001%, 100% { background-position: -64px -32px; } }","title":"Oneko","description":"Adds Oneko onto your playback bar!","imageURL":"https://raw.githubusercontent.com/spicetify/spicetify-marketplace/main/resources/assets/snippets/oneko.png"}
